Game: Classic Word Games 2009-06-16T00:00:00-07:00 Fun and classic word games for everyone! Includes Crosswords, Hangman, and many more! - Play 15 classic and new word games and learn while you're having fun. - Includes new Nintendo DSi features where you can play an endless number of crosswords. - Customized system adapts to the users level. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/1d563321-0895-422e-8928-0838d9e9b680.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/e901507f-1ee8-482d-99c3-9e89bda2f3f6.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/fae025d0-4ed3-4af4-b71b-09fcf3937cfa.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/3e8f30e1-88fd-41ba-b1b5-165ec239df74.png E - Everyone Puzzle Ubisoft Ubisoft
